title: From the Armory (4U47)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Exert a Dwarf and stack a Free Peoples card from hand here to prevent all wounds to that Dwarf.
Lore:	”'It's a bit tight around the chest.'”
Rarity:	U
